p: Various cytokines (Mip-1α, Mip-1β, IFN-γ, MCP-1, IL5, IL10, IL1α, IL1β and IL33) were quantified in the cleared lung homogenate from mice scarified on day 0, 7 and 10, using Magnetic Luminex Screening Assay (R&D systems, Minneapolis City, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The cytokine levels in the lungs were expressed as the amount of cytokine per unit weight of total protein of the lung. The quantification of total protein was determined using BSA protein Assay Kit (Thermos scientific, Meridian Road, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
